title: Junior Nuñez
text:
José Luis Junior Nuñez Julca (born 28 July 1989 in <a href="Barranca%2C%20Lima">Barranca</a>) is a <a href="Peru">Peru</a>vian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defensive%20Midfielder">Defensive Midfielder</a>, currently playing for <a href="Cienciano">Cienciano</a>.
Career.
When he started, he played as offensive midfielder, then in <a href="Sport%20Boys">Sport Boys</a> he started to play as defensive midfielder. In 2008, he was promoted to the first team by Jacinto Rodriguez. In 2009, he signed with <a href="Universitario%20de%20Deportes">Universitario de Deportes</a>, but he was loaned because he didn't have opportunities.
